name: Maze Workout - Western Lost Solo Car Racer
name_original: Maze Workout - Western Lost Solo Car Racer
description:
It's a retro western styled, maze racing game with progressive difficulty levels, that starts from easy to more complex.
You are alone in the game. it's a single player game. But with the option to save multiple user profiles.
The ambiance in the game has 30 western style music's, with a retro western outdoor architecture style.
As the name indicates you should play the levels many times to get better record times.
It's a 50 level game to find the checkpoints and do the needed laps to the finish line. Good luck!
